memberships.description: Basic Access — ideal for individuals needing essential features and updates.
memberships.detailedDescription: Bronze Membership offers basic access, perfect for individuals who want essential features and timely updates.

memberships.description: Standard Access — enjoy more perks and helpful support features.
memberships.detailedDescription: Enjoy standard access with added perks and helpful support to boost your business.

memberships.description: Premium Access — includes advanced tools and priority response time.
memberships.detailedDescription: The premium access includes advanced tools, priority support, and exclusive events.

memberships.description: All-Exclusive Access — everything included, with VIP-level benefits and support.
memberships.detailedDescription: All-inclusive package with VIP benefits, exclusive networking, and dedicated support.
